title: smallrye-openapi generates wrong definition for grouped parameters
body:
### Describe the bug

If I use grouped parameters the openapi generator generates in the spec a requestBody instead of parameters.
I tested it with cookie parameters. 

``` Java
    public static class GroupedCookieParameter {
        @RestCookie
        public String name;
        @RestCookie
        public String surname;
    }

    @GET
    @Produces(MediaType.TEXT_PLAIN)
    public String hello(GroupedCookieParameter parameter) {
        return "Hello "+parameter.name+" "+parameter.surname+" from RESTEasy Reactive";
    }
```


### Expected behavior

``` yaml
paths:
  /hello/hello:
    get:
      tags:
      - Greeting Resource
      parameters:
      - name: name
        in: cookie
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: surname
        in: cookie
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
```

### Actual behavior

``` yaml
paths:
  /hello:
    get:
      tags:
      - Greeting Resource
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/GroupedCookieParameter'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
components:
  schemas:
    GroupedCookieParameter:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        surname:
          type: string
```

### How to Reproduce?

https://github.com/drmaniac/gruopedParameter

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux C3P0 6.2.1-arch1-1 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sun, 26 Feb 2023 03:39:23 +0000 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.6" 2023-01-17 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.6+10 (build 17.0.6+10) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-17.0.6+10 (build 17.0.6+10, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
